00012 #include "rpcdds/utils/dds/Middleware.h"
00013 
00014 namespace eprosima
00015 {
00016         namespace rpc
00017         {
00018         namespace transport
00019         {
00020             class ServerTransport;
00021         }
00022 
00023 #define DDS_TIMEOUT(name, duration) DDS::Duration_t name = {duration.total_seconds(), \
00024     static_cast<EPROSIMA_UINT32>(duration.fractional_seconds() * (1000000000 / boost::posix_time::time_duration::traits_type::res_adjust()))};
00025 
00026 #define DDS_TIMEOUT_SET(name, duration) name.sec = duration.total_seconds(); \
00027         name.nanosec = static_cast<EPROSIMA_UINT32>(duration.fractional_seconds() * (1000000000 / boost::posix_time::time_duration::traits_type::res_adjust()));
00028         } // namespace rpc
00029 } // namespace eprosima
00030 
00031 #endif // _UTILS_TYPEDEFS_H_
